title: New Shop
body: OMG yassssss riot thank you riot you did such a good job on the new shop. the layout and design just.... yassssssss!

replies.body: Its just a new face still the same shit client behind it crashing every second time you go to use it I wish they would focus on glaring bugs/issues in code before the way shit looks but that would be a very unRiot thing of them to do.
I dont like its i think the other one was better

Yes. I thought the same. They've made an AWESOME work there.
Cheers!
